trans-unit.source: 1. Why is removing an item from PowerShell Gallery not exposed as an option?
trans-unit.target: 1. Why is removing an item from PowerShell Gallery not exposed as an option?

trans-unit.source: The PowerShell Gallery does not support users permanently deleting their items.
trans-unit.target: The PowerShell Gallery does not support users permanently deleting their items.

trans-unit.source: This enables others to take dependencies on your items without worrying about possible breaks in the future.
trans-unit.target: This enables others to take dependencies on your items without worrying about possible breaks in the future.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the Pester module depends on the Azure module and the Azure module is removed from the gallery, then user can no longer uses the Pester module.
trans-unit.target: For example, if the Pester module depends on the Azure module and the Azure module is removed from the gallery, then user can no longer uses the Pester module.

trans-unit.source: Instead of removing an item, however, you can unlist it instead.
trans-unit.target: Instead of removing an item, however, you can unlist it instead.

trans-unit.source: 2. What does unlisting an item on PowerShell Gallery do?
trans-unit.target: 2. What does unlisting an item on PowerShell Gallery do?

trans-unit.source: Unlisting an item such as module or script on PowerShell Gallery will remove it from the Items tab.
trans-unit.target: Unlisting an item such as module or script on PowerShell Gallery will remove it from the Items tab.

trans-unit.source: In addition, unlisted items will not be discoverable using the search bar.
trans-unit.target: In addition, unlisted items will not be discoverable using the search bar.

trans-unit.source: The only way to download an unlisted item is to specify the exact name and version of the item.
trans-unit.target: The only way to download an unlisted item is to specify the exact name and version of the item.

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the unlisting of an item will not break other modules or scripts that depend on it.
trans-unit.target: Because of this, the unlisting of an item will not break other modules or scripts that depend on it.

trans-unit.source: To unlist your item, visit the item details page and select 'Delete Item'.
trans-unit.target: To unlist your item, visit the item details page and select 'Delete Item'.

trans-unit.source: Uncheck the 'Listed' checkbox, and click Save.
trans-unit.target: Uncheck the 'Listed' checkbox, and click Save.

trans-unit.source: 3. How can I remove an item?
trans-unit.target: 3. How can I remove an item?

trans-unit.source: If you experience a scenario where item deletion is necessary, contact the PowerShell Gallery Administrators.
trans-unit.target: If you experience a scenario where item deletion is necessary, contact the PowerShell Gallery Administrators.

trans-unit.source: To submit a Delete Item Request to the PowerShell Gallery Administrators, visit your item's detail page and select Contact Support.
trans-unit.target: To submit a Delete Item Request to the PowerShell Gallery Administrators, visit your item's detail page and select Contact Support.
